name: Artifact Integrity Sealing Specification
purpose: Defines the required cryptographic signing, key management, and payload format for artifacts generated by AASS (Artifact Attestation/Signing Service), specifically DIAL Certifications and S14 State Transition Receipts, guaranteeing P-M02 and P-R03 compliance.

key_management.compromise_policy: Mandatory IH followed by DARM-defined full key revocation and RRP initiated under L-9 lockdown protocol.
